desc: See document "15 tasks to [url removed, login to view]" attached.Webapp source code is [url removed, login to view] attached.I'm putting part of the text of 15 tasks document, but better see the attached files:________1. When you click on a location point, now you can see a label with word “Encontrar” with a link. I want design more cute and smaller. Like it:2. Here you can see new menu item "Llamar" (link to call to phone watch number -user setted on registration page, see on Task 11-) Will be simply item with link: LlamarAdd another menu items (Configurar (and into it, some of other items, and a new item "Teléfonos SOS" that permits to go to a page to introduce the phone numbers:3. If you touch "Histórico" then you put Interval between 2 dates, and it shows you positions between these 2 dates. But i preffer to add time too. It is date and time (sometimes user want to know positions on the last 5 hours, for example)4. On same Histórico option. when loads all positions, if there are many points, the load is very low. Then better don't load all points between the 2 datetimes. Better do it:Only show 100 points. It is, if between 2 dates we have 200 positions, then only show one of each 2 positions: position 1, position 3, position 5, position7..... If there are 400 positions, then, take every one of each 4 positions. If 1500 positions, then divide 1500/100 = 15. It is, postition 1, position 15, position 30, position 45....If division is not integer, for example: 120 positions will be 120/100= 1.2 then we can round the results, so can be:120/100, each 1.2 positions:1.2 =position 1 (rounding 1.2)2.4 = position 2 (rounding 2.4)3.6 = position 44.8 = position 56.0 = position 67.2 = position 78.4 = position 8etc...5. I need on historic, to be possible to see the order of positions to know the movement of person. It is: from where to where?.It is, reproduce movement of person. For example, every 1 second, show a different point colored on red, on same order than positionsOn moment 0:35 of this video, you can see that label of Google maps is moving (well, hiding of a point and appearing on next point) Is possible to do it?If is not possible, then, put number of position on each point (1, 2, 3, 4, 5….) and on click on each point, show datetime and link to position6. When you touch any menu element, menu remains outspread. I preffer to compact menu after choose an option.7. Now, you can see the menu on bottom and header on top with info about last watch update and battery. If possible, i prefer this info on same compacted menu (if possible). For example, on same header, on the left side, show the menu button, and spread on touch:Or perhaps put info of watch update and battery on same menu bar text (Instead actual text "Synkiria Watch")8. When you touch command "Buscar", the position of watch appears on map, but map don't center on point. Can you do it?9. When page opens seems that center on my house (i think that there is my location putted static on code). Better center on the last position of watch.Only consider project completed after complete the 15 tasks.Release of unique Milestone after the 15 tasks.I assigned 101 usd to this projct, no more.I NEED THIS PROJECT COMPLETED THE NEXT 1st DECEMBERONLY BID IF YOU CAN DO BY 101 AND RELEASE 1st DECEMBERI WILL ONLY DO IT OVER [url removed, login to view]
title: Changes on a webapp of a GPS smart watch (15 tasks)

desc: Activity description:It is an that operates a peer-to-peer-carsharing marketplace platform. That connects private car owners and people who require vehicles all via an easy online website and mobile App interface.You would rent cars without drivers, to people who do not own their own car, or travelers who are out of town but visiting.It’s not hourly rental car however, its 1 day minimum and more days.How it works is, the car owner list his car on the App with a price rate that he decide himself or an estimate rate that the App fixs based on the car value and year make.The renter chooses the car that they find best suited for themselves and reserve it. The owner of the car approves them and hand them the car key. Now there are many security preparations such as valid driver license, passport for out siders, background check, also approve identities through Email, phone number, Facebook page and other social media, so the owner of the car can see.its very similar to Turo App but with a few more customized features that suits the rules of my country.

desc: The client needs pixel perfect with this app, it has to look and feel very fresh and up to date. As your starting on this app please download and play around with these two apps as they are in our market and we referenced both of them in creating our designs, they also do a good job in making the app feel fresh with the effects and transitions.[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]Let’s look at these slides:(***DONE***) 1, 1.A, 1.B - These should navigate just like the Door Dash intro does. Don’t worry about the functionality of the Sign In, we’re just looking to see that these come out how we’re thinking and the images look crisp and clear.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Last Phase of qualifying project-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------When you come back to work next week, can you get to these screens in the.sketch file?  And if so, could you get these done for an additional projectfor around $100 USD?  They should be included in the "3 similiar screens" app forthe same UDID, and one more I will get to you.4.A - This would be the navigation of the app, how the user will get into their account related sections. We’re looking to see that the effect of clicking the icon slides out the menu in an appropriate way, it just has to feel clean.10.B - This screen is how a user selects the order time, the idea was taken from this app ([url removed, login to view]), if you can replicate how they have it setup, that will be ideal.13 - This is the main Account page that is shown when “Account” is clicked from 4.ANOTE:  If they want M8 it will be extra.  The $100 USD is for 4.A, 10.B & 13.M8 - If time permits this would be another great screen to setup as it has a few controls as well as some animation that would take place when a user mouses over a particular rating. The idea is when you mouse over the 2nd screen the text related to 2 stars would be shown. For now, just make the text say something like “Two stars”, then change it to “Three stars” when the user mouses over 3 stars.Again, it’s very critical this doesn’t look cookie cutter and everything looks pixels perfect (our assumption is that’s possible based on the designs), so please take your time and make sure these test slides are as perfect as possible.
title: Several iOS screen development

I need an music app that refresh [url removed, login to view] 10minutes the cloud folder and auto imports the current .m3u playlist and plays the songs in order. When I upload a new playlist, It must play the new playlist after the current songs ends ( or with a schedule- Play this playlist at this date)4.	It must lock the mp3’s to protect the copyright’s from illegal copying5.	I need a mixtime (crossfade option between the tracks, like 3seconds at the end of the current track mix the next track)The interface must look like:Channel  1: Local Playlist 1 PopChannel  2: Local Playlist 2 RockChannel  3: Stream 1 Pop  (if internet dropouts autoswitch to Channel 1)Channel  4: Stream 2 Rock (if internet dropouts autoswitch to Channel 2)

desc: WHOWe are a leading digital agency based in Vientiane, Lao.One of our clients approached us about making a website/app, which can be used at exhibitions and downloaded from app/play store. During exhibitions it will be running on Zaith 10.1” Android tablets:https://www.amazon.co.uk/Expandable-processor-Bluetooth-Multi-touch-Pre-loaded/dp/B073XQLB7Z/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1510634874&sr=8-1&keywords=zaith+10.1+tabletWHATA website/app about educational options in the UK & ASEAN + China, targeted at the Lao population.HOWThe Homescreen features a world map with two areas highlighted; The UK & ASEAN + China.Clicking on either of these will take you one of two screens:1. Study in the UK: map of the UK with universities highlighted/linked. When clicking a university, a virtual tour or similar is loaded from that specific university. Example: [url removed, login to view]2. Study a British Universities in ASEAN/China: map of the ASEAN/China with universities highlighted/linked. When clicking a university, the website from that specific university is loaded. Example: [url removed, login to view] or [url removed, login to view]Client initially asked for an app, but we think it would be better to setup a website and make this into an html-app or similar. This is something we want to discuss further with the chosen freelancer.We are still in the initial phase, hence a few things still missing:* Design brief & development.* All the actual adresses from selected universities for maps.* All the links for virtual tours etc.Other requirements:* Has to be made in wordpress.* We need access to backend after delivery.* The university website has to be loaded/displayed within this website/app (we want to keep the user).* When used for exhibitions, there has to be a function which disables the device’s buttons (home, volume etc.)YOUR JOBWe will develop all design and give you psd files with all pages.Your job is to set it up according to files provided, advise us about features/functions/mechanics and eventually transfer the site to our servers. Initial milestone can be discussed.Budget is stimated to be around $400.Deadline is 5th Januar.Looking forward to our collaboration.Digital Monkey, Laos
title: Education is G.R.E.A.T.

desc: 1. FULL STACK DEVELOPERRequirements: Should have expert knowledge of CSS, HTML, Javascript, and JQuery, for custom code website development. Also, a Back-End Developer with expert knowledge of Mysql, PHP, JQuery, Ruby, and Database administration, for app development.2. WORDPRESS DEVELOPERRequirements: Should have expert knowledge of Woocommerce, PHP, CSS, HTML, and Javascript.3. APP DEVELOPERRequirements: Should be adept at developing iOS and Android native applications.All candidates are required to send in their portfolio, as well as their Facebook and LinkedIn profile links.Any application lacking the aforementioned requirements with regards to the attachment of an individual Portfolio and Social Media profile links will be immediately removed from consideration.Necessary Skills:• Team Player• Positive Attitude• Problem-Solver• Skilled Communicator• Collaborative• Eager To Learn
title: Full Stack Dev

desc: Looking for an experienced Full stack developer to build app in React Native and GraphQL. Will share UI/UX prototype mockups upon contact for further discussion. Please see landing page: [url removed, login to view]GCLondon(General Counsel London)OverviewGeneral Counsel London Limited is looking to develop a mobile app for General Counsel Networking in London, United Kingdom. The app will operate in many ways like [url removed, login to view], [url removed, login to view], [url removed, login to view] and linkedin. All the searching, matching and messaging will occur on the phone and will connect prospective clients from around the world with lawyers and law firms based in Central London.The app is restricted to London for Lawyers and Law Firms. Clients can signup from anywhere. The app is called GCLONDON app. Individuals and People responsible for legal decisions in organisations, lawyers and law firms will use this app. Searching, discovering and matching will occur on the app.
title: Full Stack Developer for GC Legal Networking App. Think Tinder for General Counsel.
